title: The Big Suey: The Crumber
description:
Amin shares his Top 5 Basketball Things from last night including a top tier Herb Jones anecdote. Then, Dan decides to play through Chris Cote for the rest of the hour. We get to a number of his topics including smiling while texting, scraping crumbs off a table at a fancy restaurant, and unclogging ears on airplanes. Plus, a story about the time Amin almost purposefully peed his pants.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
